UI

Class SkuareViewClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • UI.SkuareViewClient

  • public class SkuareViewClient
extends java.lang.Object
    SkuareView Client Main Class This class creates and runs the GUI elements of the program as well as the main function where the libraries are specified.
    Since:
    7/2/2013
    Author:
    Dylan McCarthy

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void createNewWindow(javax.swing.JPanel newWindow)
      This function creates a new window from a JPanel and adds it to the current GUI and sets it as the selected window
      void getContent(boolean activated)
      This method is used for the toggle buttons to determine if they are active or not to a specific window.
      ImagePanel getImageContent()
      This function finds the imagePanel object that belongs to a selected content window and returns the ImagePanel Object.

      Initializes the main JFrame, adds the menu bar along with the action listeners for the menu items then sets up the window layout
      protected void initContentManager()
      Creates the content Manager which handles the dockable frames, also implements the listeners for content being selected and displays the miniview.
      protected void initToolWindowManager()
      Creates the Toolbox window and the Console windows

      Main program method, this detects the current operating system and loads the appropriate libraries.

      Sets Select mode based off toggle button state
      protected void setUp()
      Initializes the Main window, toolbox and console window

      Sets up the behavior of the image windows and implements listeners for windows being detached
      protected void setupDebugTool()
      Sets up the window behavior of the Menu toolbox
      void showLayer(boolean show)
      This function enables the pixel overlay based off the state of the toggle button.
      protected void start()
      Starts the GUI and creates the toolbox object

    • Method Detail

      • createNewWindow

        protected void createNewWindow(javax.swing.JPanel newWindow)
        This function creates a new window from a JPanel and adds it to the current GUI and sets it as the selected window
        Parameters:
        newWindow - - This is the JPanel which is to be attached to the new window

      • getContent

        public void getContent(boolean activated)
        This method is used for the toggle buttons to determine if they are active or not to a specific window. In this implementation it is only used for the Zoom function.
        Parameters:
        activated - The state of the toggle button

      • getImageContent

        public ImagePanel getImageContent()
        This function finds the imagePanel object that belongs to a selected content window and returns the ImagePanel Object.
        Returns:
        Return the ImagePanel associated with this content.

      • init

        protected void init()
        Initializes the main JFrame, adds the menu bar along with the action listeners for the menu items then sets up the window layout

      • initContentManager

        protected void initContentManager()
        Creates the content Manager which handles the dockable frames, also implements the listeners for content being selected and displays the miniview.

      • initToolWindowManager

        protected void initToolWindowManager()
        Creates the Toolbox window and the Console windows

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main program method, this detects the current operating system and loads the appropriate libraries. It is important to note that the library path must be specified in the launcher script for the program to be able to find the libraries Example: java -Djava.library.path=lib -jar SkuareViewClient.jar This would specify that the libraries are stored in a directory /lib relative to the location of the jar file.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • run

        protected void run()
        Creates the GUI and starts the Threads to run it.

      • setSelect

        public void setSelect(boolean activated)
        Sets Select mode based off toggle button state
        Parameters:
        activated - Toggle Button state.

      • setUp

        protected void setUp()
        Initializes the Main window, toolbox and console window

      • setupContentManagerUI

        protected void setupContentManagerUI()
        Sets up the behavior of the image windows and implements listeners for windows being detached

      • setupDebugTool

        protected void setupDebugTool()
        Sets up the window behavior of the Menu toolbox

      • showLayer

        public void showLayer(boolean show)
        This function enables the pixel overlay based off the state of the toggle button.
        Parameters:

        Starts the GUI and creates the toolbox object
